paragraphs.text: But I was thinking all wrong. You can be happy with your current life. All it takes is a decision. And when it improves, you’ll still be happy.
paragraphs.name: 3bb5

paragraphs.text: Never be a wimp. Take criticism like a champ.

Love has no opposite. When you love someone, you can’t hate them at the same time. The foundation of all relationships should be based on: Love, respect, support, trust, patience, good company, laughter, sadness, and more support.
paragraphs.name: a7da
23ca
paragraphs.text: Here are some wrong reasons to be in a relationship: Money, fear of being alone, abuse, needing attention. If your relationship sucks, and you’ve tried to improve it multiple times, it’s time to move on.
Life is business. And smart business people spend their resources wisely. How? Be calculated. Never waste resources (especially time).
paragraphs.name: b0c3

paragraphs.text: You only improve your self-confidence by becoming good at something. How do you get good? By learning, doing, seeing results, and repeating that process for years. Your confidence will grow slowly every day.

paragraphs.name: efe3
paragraphs.text: You can use criticism to improve yourself, your product, or your service. Or, if the criticism makes no sense, it can make you angry, which is also a good thing. That type of anger is useful. “I’ll show them!”

paragraphs.name: 84b2
paragraphs.text: Waiting, postponing, doubting, researching too much — it’s all not useful. Get your act together, and decide firmly whenever you have to make one. And when you made the wrong decision, apologize, and make another decision.
But I was thinking all wrong. You can be happy with your current life. All it takes is a decision. And when it improves, you’ll still be happy.
paragraphs.name: 3bb5

paragraphs.text: Sometimes you’re a leader, sometimes you’re a follower. You can be a leader at work, and a follower at home. There’s nothing wrong with that. And being a leader also has nothing to do with your title.
paragraphs.name: 717b

ac5332b5bc84.title: Happiness is a choice, is something that I value a lot.

paragraphs.name: b972
paragraphs.text: Happiness is a choice, is something that I value a lot. I actually remind myself everyday that it’s a choice. Honestly, a lot of emotions are a choice. Yes they are hard to move past or get over, however, you can change how you feel. Even simple emotions, take this morning for example, I was extremely tired and didn’t want to get motivated or get up…

paragraphs.name: 5e7d
paragraphs.text: “Nice thought”

paragraphs.name: df48
paragraphs.text: This. We all often fail to realize that behind someone’s success is a huge journey of trying, practicing and working hard. Practice does make perfect, and also builds huge self-confidence.
